attributes.action: Stop Armed Services Pensions from being Taxed
attributes.additional_details: Review the whole of the armed services pensions. Keep them free from taxation. Remember many armed service veterans have had to put up with Poor accommodation, Poor Pay & poor conditions during their service careers. It is a total insult to tax these pensions. They should not be taxed. Armed service personnel are not respected or looked after in this country & never have been. Charities have to fill the gaps that Governments should be fulfilling. No wonder its hard to recruit,
attributes.background: To cease taxing Armed Service Veterans pensions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make the Armed Forces pension tax free
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733797
